Re: Epstein, Jeffrey Edward, Reg. No. 73618-054_1 (Out of Office)
I will be away from the office August 9 - 19, 2019. The following staff will be acting in my capacity. Please extend them the usual courtesies. Thank you.
- August 9-14,
August 15-16,
August 19,
>>> Lamine N'Diaye 08/10/19 14:21 >>>
Mr. Ormond,
Please see the attached updated time line. If you should have any questions please feel free to contact me.
Thank you

I will be away from the office August 9 - 19, 2019. The following staff will be acting in my capacity. Please extend them the usual courtesies. Thank you.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions in the 'From' field and in the list of staff acting in the sender's capacity. The document appears to be an email notification about an out-of-office period and the staff members covering the sender's responsibilities.
